scientificGeneralization.introduction: By introducing **scientific generalization** to software engineering, **Byteology** helps businesses tackle software complexity and grow.
timeline: We **gather and detail** the information defining your domain
We help your business **scale and grow**

services.title: Software Development
services.description: Byteology’s team will develop your application or minimum viable product (MVP) for you.

services.title: Migration to Microservices
services.description: Byteology will provide you with a tailored technology, strategy and process to help your business successfully migrate to microservices.

services.title: Event Sourcing
services.description: Standard software development methodologies store and utilize less than 50% of the data that runs through the system.

services.title: Consulting & Training
services.description: Byteology will provide you with tailored consulting services and training to help your business scale and grow.

services.title: Interviewing as a Service
services.description: Byteology will conduct technical and social interviews on your behalf so you can focus of your core business.

inquiry.title: Here's to working together
inquiry.callToAction: Don't hesitate to reach out to us with any request and we will help you the best we can. We usually answer within 2 business days.

contactForm.consent: I freely give my consent to have my personal information processed for the purpose of receiving feedback or solicited content.
contactForm.onSuccessBody: Thank you for reaching out! We'll make sure to help you the best we can. We usually answer within 2 business days.
contactForm.onErrorBody: We are terribly sorry but something went wrong. You can retry or just write us a plain old email.
